description: This file defines API routes for user management in a FastAPI application, including listing users, retrieving user details, and updating user profiles. It utilizes dependency injection for security and database session management, and leverages Pydantic models for request validation.

classes.name: UserUpdateRequest
classes.description: Pydantic model for updating user information, including optional full name and password fields.

methods.name: list_users(_: User = Depends(require_agent), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all users; accessible only to agents.

methods.name: get_user_by_id(user_id: int, current: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve user details by ID, with role-based access control.

methods.name: update_user(user_id: int, payload: UserUpdateRequest, current: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update user profile information, enforcing RBAC.

ctags.name: get_user_by_id
ctags.pattern: /^def get_user_by_id(user_id: int, current: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depend/
ctags.signature: (user_id: int, current: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: list_users
ctags.pattern: /^def list_users(_: User = Depends(require_agent), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: password
ctags.pattern: /^    password: Optional[str] = Field(None, min_length=6, description="New password")$/

ctags.name: update_user
ctags.pattern: /^def update_user(user_id: int, payload: UserUpdateRequest, current: User = Depends(get_current_us/
ctags.signature: (user_id: int, payload: UserUpdateRequest, current: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
